profile.rationale: The job description primarily lists tasks related to software development, implementation, and system integration (1.A.1). While it mentions working with LLM and AI technologies, these are presented as part of the software solutions being developed rather than core AI model development or specialization tasks. This indicates the role is fundamentally a software engineering position that incorporates AI elements, fitting the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.
